member.name: P:Stride.Engine.SpriteStudioComponent.RenderGroup
member.summary: The render group for this component.

member.name: P:Stride.SpriteStudio.Runtime.SpriteStudioNodeLinkComponent.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the model which contains the hierarchy to use.
member.value: The model which contains the hierarchy to use.
member.userdoc: The reference to the target entity to which attach the current entity. If null, parent will be used.

member.name: P:Stride.SpriteStudio.Runtime.SpriteStudioNodeLinkComponent.NodeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the node.
member.userdoc: The name of node of the model of the target entity to which attach the current entity.

member.name: T:Stride.StrideVersion
member.summary: Internal version used to identify Stride version.
member.remarks: During package build, PackageUpdateVersionTask is updating that file and expect some specific text regex so be careful if you change any of this.

member.name: F:Stride.StrideVersion.PublicVersion
member.summary: The version used by editor for display purpose. The 4th digit will automatically be replaced by the git height when building packages with Stride.Build.

member.name: F:Stride.StrideVersion.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: The current assembly version as text, currently same as .

member.name: F:Stride.StrideVersion.NuGetVersionSimple
member.summary: The NuGet package version without special tags.

member.name: F:Stride.StrideVersion.BuildMetadata
member.summary: The build metadata, usually +g[git_hash] during package. Automatically set by Stride.GitVersioning.GenerateVersionFile.

member.name: F:Stride.StrideVersion.AssemblyInformationalVersion
member.summary: The informational assembly version, containing -beta01 or +g[git_hash] during package.

member.name: F:Stride.PublicKeys.Default
member.summary: Assembly name suffix that contains signing information.
